entry.title: I am Usman Khan
entry.content:
I am into science of various types.

I like to play with software and electronics because that is that I work with. But I find pleasure in most other forms of art and games as well.

You want (need) some work done? Something technical, something scientificâ€¦ something worth doing? I can (probably) do it for you. For a Price. :)

Thanks!
